name: realvictorprms-Suit-Plug-Continued
title: RealVictorPRM's Suit Plug Continued
author: realvictorprm
description: Mod that allows you to charge your power suit with your factory's power and optional support for mods adding grids to vehicles. Now also includes multiple mk versions of the suit-plug equipment. This is a custom version derived from https://mods.factorio.com/mod/Suit-Plug-Continued.
